title: Type designers in London?
content:
Hello folks,

Can someone please name me few type studios or the designers based in London?  
I am here in London regarding my degree project and will be staying here for the next 4 months. I wanted to visit some of these studios while am here.

Thanks for the time,  
Satya

 [‹ A Holiday Gift From P22](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414234147/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40145 "Go to previous forum topic") ["There Will Be Blood"-- title typeface treatment ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414234147/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42664 "Go to next forum topic")
author: satya

comments.content:
[Fontsmith](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414234147/http:/www.fontsmith.com/contact.php)  
 [Jeremy Tankard](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414234147/http:/www.typography.net/contact/index.htm) has an office in London  
 [Foundrytypes](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414234147/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/)  
 [Nick Cooke](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414234147/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15001) is from england, too. Can’t find a link to his [G-Type-foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414234147/http:/www.type.co.uk/index.php?p=GType).

… and you might wanna go through this list: British Font Foundries. And make sure to pay a visit to [St Bride Library](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414234147/http:/www.stbride.org/).  
F

Jonathan Barnbrook is over there too.

[http://www.barnbrook.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414234147/http:/www.barnbrook.net/ "http://www.barnbrook.net/")

Rian Hughes  
The Foundry: David Quay, Freda Sack  
Sebastian Lester

Hi Rainer - I was in London, but high-tailed it outta Dodge 7 years ago. That is the link to me - I don’t have a website, I’ll get around to it one of these years.

Stuart Brown is also there now.

Nick Cooke
Vincent, I didn’t knew that Dalton Maag is in London ;)

Nick Cooke said:  
_That is the link to me - I don’t have a website, I’ll get around to it one of these years._

That explains it. Thanks for the info.
